name: Extreme Road Skating Stunts 3D
description:
Enjoy the Extreme Road Skating Stunts 3D game swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier and subway trains. Have exciting run surfers on Bus 3D, collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run. Underground city adventure travel along the subway tracks start now, surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit. Extreme Road Skating Stunts 3D must be a very fun run game. Download it now and start your Subway Surf run and forest surfers, join the most thrilling dash. Skateboard is a type of sports equipment used primary for the activity. Now ride on real time physics Skateboard and enjoy Skateboard racing games. You can test your skills with this Skateboard simulator games and become best Extreme Road Skating Stunts 3D skateboard stunt hero. It is new kind of skating game where you can perform some seriously challenging Stunts. In this game you can practices and improve you true skate stunts skill. In this extreme stunt skateboarding simulator game, improve your skills & ability by sliding over rails and realistic tracks. It is new kind of skating games where you can perform some seriously challenging stunts. This game is all about subway skate surfer 3d skating a skateboard and trying new trick like jump, stylish stunts, stunts in air like flipping and feel like flying. Play this virtual street skating game and learn multiple skills. This adventurous skateboarding game will stimulate reaction. Beside the simulator it is also new kind of racing games from where you can ride on amazing skateboard. Subway skate runner is an endless running game, Surfs in the subway, to be careful, more and more obstacle, oncoming try your best to rush in the beautiful city subway scenes. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier and subway trains. Have exciting run surfers on Bus 3D collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! Underground city adventure travel along the subway tracks start now, surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit. Run, jump, dash and slide over and around bus and different characters subway surf, Ruch between obstacles and run slide around bus, It is a new fascinating endless running game, a new super subway surf menu station run and a subway thrilling surfers around bus train and underground and different run subway menu.
Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid hitting obstacles, barrier and subway trains. Have exciting run surfers on Bus 3D, collect coins and buy power up. Unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! Underground city adventure travel along the subway tracks start now, surf with your friends. Run like hell and challenge your limit.
Features
- Amazing graphics, and smooth control feelings.
- Awesome 3D Graphics.
- Real skating moves and tricks.
- Easy to play just touch the screen to run and jump.
- Easy and intuitive controls.
- Amazing sound effects.
- It is paid game available on app store.
